title: Heterocycle compounds synthesized by amide ligand-promoted copper salt catalyzed construction of C–O(S) bonds
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10034-10038
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00701H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ruiting Yin, Hailong Liu, Xue Yang, Xiaoyu Zhou, Xia Chen, Shenmin Li
We introduce a mild method for the ligand-promoted copper-catalyzed coupling of 2-halophenol to construct DBDO using cost-effective copper salts, ligands, and alkaline reagents.
